value.mermaid:
erDiagram
    USERS ||--o{ FILTERS : "所有"
    USERS ||--o{ SUBTITLE_STYLES : "所有"
    USERS ||--o{ TRAINING_VIDEOS : "所有"

    USERS {
        uuid id PK
        varchar(255) email
        timestamp created_at
    }

    FILTERS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid user_id FK
        text filter_string
        timestamp created_at
    }

    SUBTITLE_STYLES {
        uuid id PK
        uuid user_id FK
        varchar(100) font_name
        integer font_size
        varchar(7) font_color
        varchar(7) background_color
        timestamp created_at
    }

    TRAINING_VIDEOS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid user_id FK
        text video_url
        jsonb subtitle_data
        timestamp created_at
    }
